description: A semi-automatic rifle chambered in 7.62x39mm, it features a deploy-able integrated bayonet.

variants.description: A semi-automatic rifle chambered in 7.62x39mm, it features a deploy-able integrated bayonet.
Judging by the charterers and markings stamped on it, this appears to have been produced in China.

description: A semi-automatic rifle chambered in 7.62x39mm, it is loaded from standard AK magazines and features a deploy-able integrated bayonet.  Judging by the charterers and markings stamped on it, this appears to have been produced in China.
